name: Battle Wizards
storyline: The players are little, quirky wizard creatures who have entered the Battle Wizards academy. They will fight each other to learn the different magical spells.
summary:
Battle wizards is a local multiplayer party/platform fighter for up to 4 players. Players collect randomly spawning spells of 4 different types, totaling to 24 unique ones. The spells include fireballs, lightning strikes, bouncing projectiles and much more. Each spell can only be launched once while picked up. 
 
Play continues until all players have run out of respawns. You can lose a respawn both by falling out of the level, or running out of health. 
 
The game includes 10 levels with their own gameplay gimmicks and an interactive tutorial. Players can customise which spells spawn each match to create specific, interesting situations.
